content.prompt: Which of the following best explains Maréchal’s view of the Constitutions of 1791 and 1795 ?

choices.label: They primarily reflected liberal bourgeois interests.
They reestablished the rights of the nobility.
They restored the privileges of the Roman Catholic Church.
They created a monarchy based on enlightened absolutism.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
